name: dubtrack.fm - Compact lobby
description: All of the information, all at once. Can you handle it?
additional_info: This is created with the default colour scheme in mind. You will need to analyze whatever theme you are using to find what colours you need for integration with other themes. If your theme favours background-image instead of background-color, you can simply delete or comment the background-image of this style. This style removes video previews from the lobby and adjust other things to fit into a compacted design to show as many communities as possible at once, hopefully improving your chances of finding other communities you may be interested in without having to do as much scrolling. This uses better lobby (fancy) as a base, reconstructing portions and adding onto it until the neat design this style presents came into being the way I wanted it. Because of the density of the information, and because there is nothing to cut down the magenta, the song name in each community listing is made white for ease of readability. 10/27/15 Removed font family declaration. Want it back? Install this style. 11/26/15 Updated for the new dubtrack.fm. I've been a little late about it (A little, you say?) but I've finally got around to updating it. The rounded borders are maintained in this style; There will be no further revisions to this style until the next interface update. 12/15/15 Minor update for highlight over room name 12/18/15 Not only are items smaller in height, the bottom is now as big as default, so other styles using gradients with a bottom colour 36px tall for the background of room items will look the same, no matter what.
